_header: Behold thou man here might thou see
_description: Appeal of Christ to Man his ‘Lemman’ — two couplets following ‘Stes homo respicias’ in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Behold þu man her myth þu seÞe armes þat i bar
                    for þeOn my passioun be þi myndeÞat þin
                    enemiȝe þe Idel ne fynde
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 41.
